title: The Animal shelf
creator_credit: Ellen Meske, Jackie Cockle and Cosgrove Hall Films
brief_description: Join the animals on Timothy’s animal shelf- Stripey, Getup, Gumpa, Little Mut and Woeful as they embark on a series of exciting adventures. Based on the books by Ivy Wallace and adapted for television by Julia and Chris Allen. Hottest Day of the Year (310725) Stripey to the Rescue (310728) Music in the Woods (310729) The Mystery of the Pictures (310730) Little Mut Goes Flying (310731)
